boxes.title: Sign Up
boxes.content: We need few information about you, and our team will contact you in 2 days.

boxes.title: Get Verified
boxes.content: All our captains have to pass our verification process, check the Captains page to know the eligibility criteria.

boxes.title: Choose your Vehicle
boxes.content: Using our smart calculator, you can estimate your weekly earnings and choose a suitable car with a flexible financing plan.

boxes.title: Drive and Own
boxes.content: You will pay a weekly amount deducted from your earnings based on a up to 36 months plan with a clear path ownership.

boxes.title: Women Empowrment
boxes.content: We are committed to helping women become successful business owners and to be self-sufficient.

boxes.title: Environmentally friendly
boxes.content: Our commitment to building a productive hybrid and electric fleet in the world, and positively contributing to a more sustainable world.

boxes.title: Financial independency
boxes.content: With our financial solution, captains can access vehicle financing, thus allowing them to be more productive and financially independent.

boxes.title: Sustainability
boxes.content: Our ultimate goal is to achieve sustainability through maintaining the quality of our services and establishing a high-quality partnership with high reliability.
